news.title: Folk singer walks out of venue before gig after learning JD Vance was in attendance
news.summary: "Morals are more important than money," said Mavies about her decision to leave the venue.

news.title: Radiohead release Hail To The Thief Live Recordings 2003-2009 live album
news.summary: Out digitally now, the physical version of the record comes out on October 31.

news.title: Nicola Coughlan and Siobhan McSweeney to star in The Playboy of the Western World production
news.summary: The Playboy of the Western World will run at the Lyttelton Theatre in London from December 4, 2025 through February 28, 2026.

news.title: Brendan Gleeson urges RTÉ to add arts slot to Six One News: “I think we need to levitate it in the national conversation”
news.summary: The Emmy-winning actor will make his return to the stage for the first time in ten years at Dublin’s Olympia Theatre tonight

news.title: On this day in 1990: Pixies released Bossanova
news.summary: 35 years ago today, Pixies released their third studio album, Bossanova – continuing a phenomenal run of records that also included 1988's Surfer Rosa and 1989's Doolittle. To celebrate, we're revisiting our original album review...

news.title: Dylan Flynn and the Dead Poets announce Ireland and UK tour dates
news.summary: The tour will include shows in Cork, Galway, Limerick, Listowel and Dublin.
